title: An Explosive New Detail Emerges Which Could Explain the COVID Origin (Ep 1536)
description:
What did China know about the coronavirus? A shocking piece in the NY Post alleges that the Chinese communists are hiding something big. 

News Picks:

A stunning NY Post article about the origins of the coronavirus.


Twitter widely mocked for claiming it’s fighting for human rights.

Were taxpayers dollars used to fund a Chinese bio-weapons program?


North Face is mocked for their unbelievable hypocrisy.

A big upset happened in this Texas Mayor’s race.

Yale psychiatrist unleashes a racist tyrade.
